name: deciCMS
short_description:
A program is as good as the users like it. DeciGen needs an interface that can be customized easily and yet have very small foot print.  deciCMS is targeted for that. 

It is a CMS, where one can change the content on the fly, without shutting down the site or doing any FTP. It is modular, where one can configure different components around to suit the requirement of look and feel. 

It is based on PHP & MySQL.
